summary: This appears to be a brief internal correction and roster communication from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York regarding officer assignments for Thursday, Friday, and Saturday. It corrects the title of an officer and lists watch officers and lieutenants, though some names are redacted.

persons.name: M. Thomas
persons.context: Identified in a correction as the correct title for an officer previously misidentified as a Senior Officer.

persons.name: T. Noel
persons.context: Listed as one of the Morning Watch Officers on the attached rosters for Thursday, Friday, and Saturday.

locations.name: MCC New York
locations.address: 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
locations.context: The facility from which this internal roster and correction correspondence originates.

keyFacts: This is an internal communication from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
It contains a correction regarding the title of officer M. Thomas (Material Handler Supervisor, not Senior Officer).
It references attached rosters for officer assignments on Thursday, Friday, and Saturday, listing T. Noel as a Morning Watch Officer.
The names of the Morning Watch Lieutenant and Day Watch Lieutenant are redacted in the provided text.
